comment.author: 73660307@N03
comment._content: A good shot of my father who died October 16, 1999. The pewter pieces on view rest on a tree stump my father used as a work surface for hammering or "wroughting" pewter with specialized hammers.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Thank you, sbl195207, for sharing your memories of your father with us!

Mary
US National Archives

comment.author: 16885779@N07
comment._content: He was father to his own and a surrogate dad to many more of us!   Bill Patriquin
